mapper.select:
select ooss.id, ooss.outbound_order_id, ooss.shop_sku_id, ooss.outbound_quantity,ooss.remark, ooss.create_time, ooss.create_by, ooss.update_time, ooss.update_by ,s.shop_name, ss.shop_sku ,sku.sku, IFNULL((select sum(ssw.inventory_quantity) from shop_sku ssw,shop sw WHERE ssw.shop_id=sw.shop_id and sw.type=2 AND ssw.sku_id=ss.sku_id and sw.shop_id=oo.outbound_shop_id),0) inventory_quantity_warehouse, IFNULL((select sum(ssw.inventory_quantity) from shop_sku ssw,shop sw WHERE ssw.shop_id=sw.shop_id and sw.type=2 AND ssw.sku_id=ss.sku_id and sw.shop_id!=oo.outbound_shop_id),0) inventory_quantity_other_warehouse
from outbound_order_shop_sku ooss left join shop_sku ss on ooss.shop_sku_id=ss.shop_sku_id left join sku on sku.sku_id=ss.sku_id left join outbound_order oo on ooss.outbound_order_id=oo.id left join shop s on oo.shop_id=s.shop_id where ooss.outbound_order_id=#{outboundOrderId}
and ss.shop_sku like concat('%',#{shopSku},'%')
and sku.sku like concat('%',#{sku},'%')
order by ss.shop_sku
mapper.insert: insert into `outbound_order_shop_sku`(outbound_order_id,shop_sku_id,outbound_quantity,create_by,create_time) select #{outboundOrderId} outbound_order_id,fplss.`shop_sku_id`,sum(fplss.quantity) outbound_quantity ,#{dealUserId} create_by,now() create_time from `fba_packing_list_shop_sku` fplss where fplss.`fba_packing_list_id`=#{fbaPackingListId} group by fplss.`shop_sku_id`
